OOC: (KINDA) **Blindchaos jabbs robertdahl hard in the shoulder**
     "It's Blind *FEAR*, not Blindchaos. See below. Ye know..when 
Triggerhappy was mentioned. Don't let it happen again. Sheesh..these 
organics..."

    (Me) Ok...I couldn't restrain him! He kept threatening to string 
my intestines around the windows like they were christmas lights if I 
didn't let him speak! Anyway, hope yer holiday goes well! 

******************************************

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> The Dark Avians hollow halls began to emit noise. "Emergency, 
Emergency,
> uknown signatures within range of base. Select course of actions." 
it
> informed the base. Megatron snarled. To much was going on at one 
time,
> he opened a com-link. "Triggerhappy, Skullgrin, Blindchaos, head 
towards
> the pods, I will meet you there." he said over it. He then turned to
> Dominjoe and Blind Chaos. "Nevermind, you will have your first test 
in
> the field." he said calmly, pointing to them to follow him." He 
headed
> towards the exit. "Computer, innitiate defence system in two 
cycles." he
> commanded.

    ::DOMNIJOE AND BLINDCHAOS::

    When Megatron was giving the tour before the Emergancy alarm(s) 
went off, Domnijoe was absorbed in everything Megatron did and said. 
She silently absorbed what he said about the D. Avain and hoped she 
survived along enough to see it's completion. She glanced at 
Blindchaos, who seemed to be busy looking *AT* Megatron...the way a 
Decepticon teen looks at a cute femme. He was careful not to let 
Megatron notice.
    (Ugh....) she thought. (And I *KNOW* he's only doing it to annoy 
me. Makes it look convincing, though.) She shook off the thought with 
a flinch.
    When the Alarms went off and their commander ordered them to 
follow, both Decepticons eagerly did as told.
    "As you wish, Lord Megatron." Domnijoe said with another polite 
bow after his command.
    Blindchaos simply looked thrilled to bits.
    "Allllrrriiiight!" he cheered. "We get so se some ACTION!!"

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

**************
